ygData.subject: RE: Pzygin
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, he ll hit ya with a fear. I was just watching someone fight him and the next thing I knew I was running for the hills. The old sit and stand trick will
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, he'll hit ya with a fear. I was just watching someone fight him and
the next thing I knew I was running for the hills.
The old sit and stand trick will work on this though. If you sit and stand
it will give control back to you.
John

-----Original Message-----
From: Jared Hughes [SMTP:jaredh@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 6:46 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Pzygin

From: "Jared Hughes" <jaredh@...>

he conned blue to me at 30, he has some very nasty dot's and dd's,
after you
kill him, varsoon the undying will spawn and he will cast darkness
spells on
you so dont even think of trying to kite him, and undying hits for
70-80, he
demolished my pet and killed me, because i didnt' meditate long
enough after
killing varsoon and his pet. varsoon has about 500 hp i think, his
dd did
about 225 damage to me, he only got to cast it once, he casts a fear
type
spell i think, not totally sure i resisted it everytime he cast it.

Veldra Rae`lynn
lvl 31 Magician
Veeshan

-----Original Message-----
From: Doug Sorensen [mailto:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 3:30 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Pzygin


From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>

I haven't ever fought him, but I think he is in the
low 20s. Maybe someone else here knows for sure?

Belgarth

--- Reuben Aguilar <reuben@...> wrote:
> From: "Reuben Aguilar" <reuben@...>
>
> What level is Pzygin ? im on a mission to get me a
> Glowing Black Stone ?
